about.title: About the System
about.projectDescriptionText: Container Loading Simulator is a tool designed for logistics and supply chain professionals to help optimize loading plans and improve efficiency. The system uses advanced 3D visualization technology and intelligent algorithms to provide intuitive and efficient loading planning solutions.
about.donationDescription: While we promise that this system will always be free to use, maintaining and developing new features requires resources. If you find this project helpful, please consider supporting us to continue improving it through the following methods.
about.supportersThankYou: Thank you to the following users for their generous support of the project!
about.freeForeverPromise: Regardless of the donations received, we always promise that this system will remain free forever, with no hidden costs or feature limitations.
